cpl.readme:
\define icn(icon) \end A button (<>) that applies 2nd level bulleted list formatting to lines containing selection.
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/list-bullet2}} You can apply 2nd level bulleted list formating to * plain text * bulleted lists
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button
cpl.author: TonGerner
cpl.name: 2nd level bulleted list button
title: Plugin_202207202018574
